title: Powering the Next Wave of AI with Oracle Acceleron and NVIDIA BlueField-4
text: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure’s new Zettascale10 platform combines Oracle Acceleron networking and NVIDIA BlueField-4 DPUs to deliver secure, high-performance AI infrastructure at massive scale. Supporting up to 800,000 GPUs, it enables efficient, secure, and cost-effective training and deployment of advanced AI models—setting a new standard for AI cloud infrastructure through deep Oracle-NVIDIA collaboration.
